ISSUE.TITLE: Any plan to support tag_push_event of gitlab?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As we wanna trigger some action by gitlab tag event, e.g. building&pushing docker image, tag_push_event supporting is required. i've submit a PR in Bugagazavr/go-gitlab-client to support tag_push_event by go-gitlab-client. https://github.com/Bugagazavr/go-gitlab-client/pull/11

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [Rules] Expose extra `Branch.PullReq` fields on merge DryRyn as required by UI (#1117)
